ToolTips.note: Description/min, max, and default values/special behavior (increment amounts, etc), list of options for option lists?

Parameter.name: Data2asCV
Parameter.tooltip: Data 2 Knob CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeACV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade A CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeAWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade A Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeBCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade B CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeBWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade B Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeCCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade C CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeCWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade C Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeDCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade D CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeDWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade D Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: AttackFromCurrent
Parameter.tooltip: Start Attack from Zero or from Current Value, May Eliminate Clicks

Parameter.name: AutoTrigger
Parameter.tooltip: When Selecting New Preset - Wait for Trigger to Play or Start Playing Immediately

Parameter.name: ChannelMode
Parameter.tooltip: Channel Mode\rMaster - Used to Indicate a Normal Mono or Left Stereo Channel\rLink - Will Play When Master Layer Above is Triggered\rStereo/Right - Companion Channel to Stereo Master. Inherits the trigger/gate and channel parameters (except for pan) of the Master channel above it\rCycle - Samples Play Sequentially on Each Trigger

Parameter.name: LinAMisExtEnv
Parameter.tooltip: Linear AM is External Envelope, Off / On

Parameter.name: LoopLengthIsEnd
Parameter.tooltip: Toggles between Loop Length and Loop End for input value

Parameter.name: LoopMode
Parameter.tooltip: Loop Mode, No Loop, Loop, Loop and Release

Parameter.name: MixModIsFader
Parameter.tooltip: Mix Mod is Fader, Normal - CV Can Increase or Decrease Volume, Is Fader - 0V is Zero Volume and 5V is +6 dB

Parameter.name: Pan
Parameter.tooltip: Pan Postition Value, -1.00 to 1.00 (Left to Right), Default 0

Parameter.name: Pitch
Parameter.tooltip: Pitch Value in Semitones, -96 to 60, Default 0

Parameter.name: PlayMode
Parameter.tooltip: Play Mode, Gated or One Shot

Parameter.name: PMSource
Parameter.tooltip: Phase Modulation Source, Channel 1 to Channel 8, Left, Right, or Select CV, Default Channel 1

Parameter.name: SpliceSmoothing
Parameter.tooltip: Splice Smoothing, Off / On, May Help With Clicks

Parameter.name: XfadeGroup
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade Group, A B C or D, Default None

Parameter.name: ZonesCV
Parameter.tooltip: Zones CV, Assigns CV for Selection of Zone, 0A - 8C, Default Off

Parameter.name: ZonesRT
Parameter.tooltip: Zones Retrigger, Determines When the Zone Change Occurs, Gate Rise, Continuous, Advance, Random

Parameter.name: MinVoltage
Parameter.tooltip: Minimum Voltage to Switch Zones, -5.00 to 4.99
